title: Trickery Domain
content: centration Seeming Lv 5 Illusion Action Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m Blade Barrier Lv 6 Evocation Action 6-60 Damage 6d10 Slashing Summons a wall of razor-sharp blades that turns the area into Difficult Terrain and damages anyone foolish enough to come close. 1 Turn 18m DEX SaveConcentration Create Undead Lv 6 Necromancy Action Raise a corpse as a heinous mummy that fights by your sde. Until Long Rest The target must be a Medium or Small corpse. 3m Harm Lv 6 Necromanc
